<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silver Crescent](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1930)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Lozenge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=484" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A piquant tamarind and chili-lime flavor infuses a silver crescent, which was first created to aid those battling the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). For 1 hour, you shed cool, white light like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60), and you gain an item bonus to saving throws against [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246) effects according to the crescent's type. While shedding this light, you can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) if you're visible, and if you're [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), you're concealed instead rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

 **Secondary Effect** <actions string="Two Actions" /> **Effect** A ray of light descends on a 5-foot square of your choice within 120 feet. Any creature in that space takes positive damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save and is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the end of its next turn on a failed save. This is treated as [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, and the like. The silver crescent becomes inert.

</column>
